title: Monday's Gazette: The Rat Market closes its doors!
generic intro: (Hi! I'm a work-in-progress tumblr bot for Fallen London world qualities updates! I'm still very early in development but if you're seeing this post it means I'm working somewhat.
The Rat Market is once again closed! Here's what to expect for next week:

rat_season.text: The Rat Season has turned to {value}, meaning the following items will be available for sale:

rat_moon.text: The Rat-Moon has become {value}: [[{item}]] will be available for {ratprice} Rat Shillings.

rat_wind.text: The Rat-Wind now blows {value}: [[{item}]] will be available for {ratprice} Rat Shillings.

rat_rlseason.text: The False Season is {value}: [[{item}]] will be available for 10,000 Rat Shillings.

demand_generic.1: {alias} has just arrived and is buying the following items:
demand_generic.2: {alias}, leaving soon, is buying the following items:
demand_generic.3: {alias} has departed from the Rat Market, and won't be seen again for at least 3 weeks.

demand_tempestuous.1: {alias} has just arrived and is buying the following items:
demand_tempestuous.2: {alias}, leaving soon, is buying the following items:
demand_tempestuous.3: {alias} has departed from the Rat Market, and won't be seen again for at least 3 weeks.

demand_tempestuous.1: Additionally, the Shrivelled Celebrant is selling [[Gant-filled Mirrorcatch Boxes|Gant-filled Mirrorcatch Box]] for 3,750 Rat Shillings.
demand_tempestuous.2: Additionally, the Shrivelled Celebrant is selling [[Gant-filled Mirrorcatch Boxes|Gant-filled Mirrorcatch Box]] for 3,750 Rat Shillings.
